```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
stream <- read_delim("../Data/streaming-platform-data.csv")
```

Age ratings by platform:
```{r}
ageDemograph <- stream %>% 
  filter(Age != "NA") %>% 
  group_by(Age) %>% 
  summarize(Netflix = sum(Netflix), Hulu = sum(Hulu), `Prime Video` = sum(`Prime Video`), `Disney+` = sum(`Disney+`))

ageDemograph

ggplot(ageDemograph) +
  geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = class)) 
```
